full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 42 of 262 1747 LC8VMAX2 Shawn - direct 1 Q. After that first time, did you go with Carolyn to Jeffrey Epstein's house again? 2 Epstein's house again? 3 A. I did. 4 Q. About how often did you go with Carolyn to Jeffrey Epstein's house? 5 Epstein's house? 6 A. About every two weeks. 7 Q. To the best of your knowledge, about when did Carolyn stop going over to Jeffrey Epstein's house in Palm Beach? 8 A. When we left and went to Georgia. 9 Q. Do you remember about how old Carolyn was when you went to Georgia? 10 A. Sixteen. 11 Q. Are you and Carolyn still together now? 12 A. No, ma'am. 13 Q. About when did you break up? 14 A. 2005. 15 Q. During the period when Carolyn was going to Jeffrey Epstein's house with you, do you know how she would schedule times to go there? 16 A. Somebody would call my phone. 17 Q. How many people do you remember calling your phone? 18 A. Three. 19 Q. Were they male or female? 20 A. Female. 21 Q. Do you know any of their names? 22 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013320

text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 42 of 262 1747 LC8VMAX2 Shawn - direct

Q. After that first time, did you go with Carolyn to Jeffrey Epstein's house again? Epstein's house again? A. I did. Q. About how often did you go with Carolyn to Jeffrey Epstein's house? Epstein's house? A. About every two weeks. Q. To the best of your knowledge, about when did Carolyn stop going over to Jeffrey Epstein's house in Palm Beach? A. When we left and went to Georgia. Q. Do you remember about how old Carolyn was when you went to Georgia? A. Sixteen. Q. Are you and Carolyn still together now? A. No, ma'am. Q. About when did you break up? A. 2005. Q. During the period when Carolyn was going to Jeffrey Epstein's house with you, do you know how she would schedule times to go there? A. Somebody would call my phone. Q. How many people do you remember calling your phone? A. Three. Q. Were they male or female? A. Female. Q. Do you know any of their names?
